What is the Best Hotel Credit Card?
Booking Discounts
Some credit cards may offer time-limited booking discounts on selected hotels through travel portals like Expedia.com.hk, Agoda,etc with minimum spend requirements.
Special Offers
With designated credit cards, cardholders can enjoy special dining offers on buffet menu, à la carte, etc. in participating hotels and restaurants in Hong Kong.
Point Rewards
Some cards offer great flexibility for point redemption. Cardholders can either redeem flight tickets or hotel stays with points.
Popular Hotel Rewards Programs
Different hotel groups provide their own hotel reward programs which offer an array of privileges and discounts.
Marriott Bonvoy
Marriott Bonvoy is Marriott International's loyalty program which allows members to access a wide range of benefits at over 6,700 participating hotels across 130 countries, including The Ritz-Carlton, JW Marriott, W Hotels and Sheraton in town.
Hilton Honors
Hilton Honor is Hilton's loyalty program that gives members exclusive benefits at Hilton's hotels. Participating hotels include Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, Canopy by HiltonTM, Curio Hilton Hotels and more.
IHG Rewards
IHG Rewards is loyalty program by InterContinental Hotels Group, which allows members to earn free accommodation in more than 5,000 participating hotels around the world, which include InterContinental Hotels, Crowne Plaza Hotels, Holiday Inns, Holiday Inn Express Hotels and more.
Hotel Credit Card Promotions
DBS Hotel Credit Card Promotion & Discounts
DBS credit cards are offering year-round promotions with Agoda, Hotels.com & Booking.com. DBS Black World Mastercard members can enjoy up to 12% off hotel booking on Expedia.com.hk, 8% discount on hotel booking on Hotels.com and 12% off hotel bookings on Agoda.com.
Frequently Asked Questions
What is the best hotel frequent stay program?
It depends on where you usually travel, which hotels you prefer staying and what credit card you are currently using etc.
Can I have additional credit cards for my family?
Yes. Most credit cards offer supplementary cardholders the same hotel rewards and discount benefits as the principal cardholders.
What information do I need to apply for a credit card?
In general, applicants are required to submit three document types - income proof (e.g. payslip), identification proof (e.g. HKID card), and address proof (e.g. utility bill). You may be required to submit additional supporting documents if necessary.
What do I need to pay attention to when using hotel credit card promotion?
Don't forget to book on the designated link to claim the offer. If you go to the general website or book via the mobile applications, you usually cannot book with the offer. Make sure the discount is applied before you proceed to pay.
